title-group.article-title: A Stable Test for Strict Sign Regularity

abstract.p: A stable test to check if a given matrix is strictly sign regular is provided. Among other nice properties, we prove that it has an optimal growth factor. The test is compared with other alternative tests appearing in the literature, and its advantages are shown.
